name: Æxpression
description:
Æxpression, a free mobile game that will let you embark on an adventure with endless possibilities on your phone. Æxpression is part of an extremely dense fantasy world, so you can go from playing to reading and vice versa.

Æxpression is an adventure game for Android based on the unique concept of creating custom magic formulas. The more levels you climb, the more "Power Words" (and other unique abilities) you will unlock to cast incantations with devastating effects!

The game is currently in Beta Testing but already features:

- Single Player Adventure Mode
- 2 out of 4 Æxpression Fields
- Hidden Powers
-  Donjon
- Multiplayer Arena
